pullRequest.title: Adding a TimeSource in Utils to easily inject and test the auth token expiration.

commit.message: Dropping guava and appcompat dependency from FIS SDK.

Adding a TimeSource in Utils to easily inject and test the auth token
expiration functionality.

Also, added the tests that were removed when fixing the Calendar
instance.
